Now the avatar is also adjacent to a key represented by '@' at row 10, column 10 and has a sword represented by '*' at row 10, column 2. Given this new context, it seems prudent to engage with the key next, as it will be necessary for overcoming obstacles in the game.

Therefore, I will take the action to use the key sprite at this time.

``` Action: 1 ```

This action aims to interact with the key to collect it, which is essential for progressing towards accessing blocked paths or doors. I expect this will yield positive results as gaining the key aligns well with the strategy of collecting collectibles in the game.

Now, the avatar is also adjacent to a key (@) at row 10, column 10 and has the sword at row 10, column 2. ``` Action: 2 ```

This action will move the avatar left to collect the key, which aligns with the overall strategy of gathering necessary items to access blocked paths and complete objectives.
